name: Issa Loubani
summary: As a 23-year-old programmer, I am a full-stack developer with expertise in Flutter and Spring Boot . I am able to design and develop both the front-end and back-end of an application. I am based in Lebanon and am eager to bring my skills and experience to a team in need of a full-stack developer.I am a quick learner and always eager to expand my knowledge and skills, I'm confident my skills and attitude will make me an asset to any team.
